name: RPG Rogue-Like Prototype
description:
An Attempt at creating a rogue-like rpg.

Controls:

use mouse on main menu.

Movement: W-A-S-D

Enter/Exit Attack mode: Q

Once in attack mode, select target with mouse cursor and left-click

Check Inventory: i

Open Pause Menu: ESC

I may return to this at some point as a lot of the "basic" mechanics have been implemented (Stat and Skill modifiers are in place, just need items to make use of the different skills). Things left to do: Level up mechanics, picking up/dropping items, add more items, enemy variety/difficulty, more rooms. Basically, the things that make this kind of game fun.
